description:
Sweat can wreak havoc on metal. Protect your trainer and fitness equipment from corrosion and help keep it in tip-top shape. One coat of Sweat Protect lasts up to 3 months.

  • Prevents rust and corrosion on indoor trainers and gym equipment
  • Spray bottle penetrates deep, with a tracer dye to ensure complete coverage
name: Muc-Off Sweat Protect
